group_1.textCenter: (A Doppel...)

group_1.narration: I helped Ikumi carry Yumi@to the Coordinator's shop.@That's where I learned about Doppels.

group_1.textCenter: (It looked kinda like...a Witch.)

group_1.narration: It was a very recent phenomenon. Even the@senior Magical Girls didn't know about them.
Normally I would've jumped at the chance@to write an article about such a scoop...@But this time I felt in way over my head.

group_1.textCenter: (Looks like that Ikumi girl doesn't know much@about it either.)
(I feel like Mitama knows more, but she isn't@going to tell us...)
(Should I keep trying to work info out of@her? She's pretty tricky to deal with.)
(I guess I could look for another source...)
*Sigh*
(I'm always leaping right into action the@second I spot it, but here I am worrying.)
This isn't like me at all.
(No, I need to face the facts.)
(Namely...that I don't really want to face@these facts at all.)
Oh! There you are!
Mifuyuuu! She's over here!

group_1.narration: My future comrade-in-arms as@a White Feather, Tsukasa Amane.

group_1.textRight: It was the right choice to bring you with me,@Tsukasa!
I would've gotten so lost without you. I@don't know this area at all.

group_1.narration: And with her was the girl who acted as a@mediator amongst the Feathers: Mifuyu Azusa.
By the way... I'm not sure if you@know about this, Ikumi, but there's@a reason they knew where to find me.
Mitama leaks information about any girls@who find out about Doppels and turning into@Witches to the Wings of the Magius.
She doesn't miss a beat when it comes to @that sort of thing.

group_1.textRight: Hello there. You must be Ryo Midori.

group_1.textLeft: You better tell me who you are if you want@something from me.

group_1.textRight: My apologies.
I'm Mifuyu Azusa. I'm a Magical Girl, just@like you.
And I'm Tsukasa Amane. I'm a Magical Girl,@too!
I heard that you saw a Doppel recently.

group_1.textLeft: I guess you guys must know something about@them too, if you're hunting me out.

group_1.textRight: Know something? Yes, that's correct. We know@a lot of things, in fact.
For instance... We know the truth about what@it means to be a Magical Girl.
Yes.
To be honest, we're here to scout you.
Those who learn the truth of Magical Girls@and want to escape their fates...
And those who witness Doppels, and are very@close to figuring out that truth themselves.
We come to enlist people like you who want@liberation.

group_1.textLeft: I'm guessing this isn't a casual chat, then.

group_1.textRight: You probably won't feel that great after you@hear what we have to say.
Will you still hear us out?

group_1.textLeft: If there're hidden truths to be uncovered, I@want to hear everything.

group_1.narration: Mifuyu told me all about the final fate@awaiting all Magical Girls. That we@would eventually turn into Witches.

group_1.textLeft: (That miracle Kyubey granted for me when I@met him... And this power I have now...)
(It wasn't meant to make up for all the@inequalities I've had to deal with?)

group_1.narration: He tricked me. He CHEATED me!
I'm sure you of all people understand@how intense my shock was@when I learned the truth, Ikumi.
I thought this miracle was in exchange for@all that I'd been saddled with since birth.
The truth was that a far, far worse fate@was waiting for me...nothing more.

group_1.textRight: We're the Wings of the Magius.
Our mission is to liberate Magical Girls@from that fate.
I'm not asking you to decide right now.
However...
If you want to be freed from your fate of@turning into a Witch, no matter what...
You can work with us to achieve that goal.
All right! We'll be waiting for your reply.@Hope you make the right choice!
Now, now, Tsukasa. It's her decision to@make. We can't make it for her.
We'll be happy to hear your decision whenever@you come to one.

group_1.textCenter: (I've been reporting on all sorts of people@for long enough to know...)
(They were telling the truth.)
(So I'm going to turn into a Witch and die?@No thanks.)
(I don't want to take on any more karmic@burdens at this point, either!)
(I still can't quite trust them.)
(So what do I do?)

group_1.narration: After all...@No matter the situation, I have@to think things over myself and decide@what to do, on terms I can agree with.
I can't have faith in a path someone@else leads me toward.
I pondered it all night...@And then made my decision.

group_1.textCenter: Welcome to the Wings of the Magius.@We're so happy to have you here.
